name: Truth of Yaguzi Eventure
description:
With Ginko defeated, the Velinski family rules Party Sanctuary World once again. Cipo and The Nays are temporarily staying at a hotel in this World, near Gallu's Sanctuary. Yaguzi has a plan that he needs to confront Gallu about.

This takes place very far into the storyline, but there are plans to make the earlier parts into Twine stories at some point as well! This was mostly a first test to see how a full Eventure would look in Twine format.
